description: A vibrant island kingdom in the New World known for its passionate culture, flamenco dancing, colorful architecture, and unique population of living toys coexisting with humans. The island is ruled by Donquixote Doflamingo, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Dressrosa
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates, along with Law, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke, arrive at Dressrosa and witness its colorful buildings, passionate people, and living toys.
keyEvents.significance: Beginning of the Dressrosa Arc, one of the longest and most significant arcs in One Piece. The island becomes the setting for major battles and revelations.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Living Toys
keyEvents.description: The crew witnesses Dressrosa's most distinctive feature: sentient toys living and working alongside humans, playing games, and having jobs as part of society.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the central mystery of the arc - these toys are actually transformed humans, victims of Sugar's Hobi Hobi no Mi power.

description: The port town of Dressrosa where ships dock and visitors first enter the island. Features colorful streets, restaurants, casinos, and numerous living toys interacting with human citizens.

keyEvents.title: Landing at Acacia Port
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats dock at Acacia port and split into three teams before beginning their exploration of Dressrosa.
keyEvents.significance: The entry point to Dressrosa and the starting location for the arc's events.

keyEvents.title: Fujitora Asks Zoro for Directions
keyEvents.description: On the streets of Acacia, the blind man Fujitora encounters Zoro and asks for directions to a gambling house.
keyEvents.significance: Site of the first meeting between Zoro and Admiral Fujitora.

keyEvents.title: Fujitora Cheated at Casino
keyEvents.description: At a restaurant casino in Acacia, Doflamingo's thugs cheat the blind Fujitora at roulette, taking advantage of his disability.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the underlying corruption in Dressrosa beneath its beautiful exterior.

description: A small island north of Dressrosa, connected by a long bridge. The planned meeting location where Law intends to exchange Caesar Clown with Doflamingo.

keyEvents.title: Law's Team Heads to Green Bit
keyEvents.description: Law, Usopp, Robin, and Caesar prepare to head north across the bridge to Green Bit for the planned exchange with Doflamingo.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the location for a critical confrontation between Law and Doflamingo that will drive much of the arc's plot.
